tweet.text: Dr. Alex Poster of @HistoryatState spoke today as a panelist on The Evolution of the U.S. Response to HIV/AIDS in a program organized by the @DiplomacyCenter. See the #FRUS compilation on #AIDS policy published in November 2017: https://t.co/t6YPLJkcNj https://t.co/tjiNZFfvjk
